title: Account Recovery
body:
So I submitted a ticket to support, but my original problem seemed to be misunderstood. I'm having a problem recovering an old account that was created on NA about 5 years ago. I was well past level 30 with rp purchases on the account and for some reason I cannot get the recovery email to the registered email address. Now, I know the account still exists as you can see it with my match histories in the client I just can't recover it.

The username on the account: PwnStarTerry

replies.body: If you're having problems getting back into your account, your best bet would be to hit us up again through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We won't be able to just give out any information tied to the account, since we consider all of that sensitive info.
